title: Japan’s Weekend Election Spurs Caution Before 30-Year Bond Sale
description: Traders are watching out for signs of weak demand at Thursday’s sale of 30-year Japanese government bonds, just days before Sunday’s closely monitored lower house election.
content: Traders are watching out for signs of weak demand at Thursday’s sale of 30-year Japanese government bonds, just days before Sunday’s closely monitored lower house election.
